title.narrative: CHASE core staff resourcing (standby capacity salaries, pensions, remunerations)

description.narrative: This activity (CHASE core staff resourcing (standby capacity salaries, pensions, remunerations)) is a component of Humanitarian Emergency Response Operations and Stabilisation Programme (HEROS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £39,760,306. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-07-2017 and the end date is 28-10-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
